titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 27) to facilitate the provisions of additional financial resources to the Federal Savings and Loan Insurance Corporation.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-77.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 5/4/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 27 (Federal Savings and Loan Insurance Corporation finances).
